actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Policy.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Policy

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that extended voluntary departure status should be granted to El Salvadorans in the United States whose safety would be endangered if they were required to return to El Salvador.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of State should recommend to the Attorney General that aliens who are nationals of El Salvador be granted extended voluntary departure status until they can reside safely in El Salvador.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that extended voluntary departure status should be granted to El Salvadorans in the United States whose safety would be endangered if they were required to return to El Salvador.
